annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: of crude oil based fuels to consumers in the United Kingdom or persons carrying on business in the United Kingdom; and
annotations.translation: 向英国境内的消费者或境内开展业务的人提供原油基燃料；以及

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: where they have travelled to the United Kingdom in the course of their work.
annotations.translation: 他们在工作过程中曾前往英国。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: where they have travelled to the United Kingdom in the course of their work.
annotations.translation: 他们在工作期间曾前往英国。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 29. (1) A worker required to undertake or commence within the period during which they would, but for this paragraph, have had to self-isolate in accordance with regulation 9
annotations.translation: 29. (1) 根据条例 9，被要求在他们应承担或开始的期限内从事或开始的工人，如果没有本款，他们必须自我隔离

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 30. A postal operator, as defined in section 27 (3) of the Postal Services Act 2011 (d), where they have travelled to the United Kingdom in the course of their work.
annotations.translation: 30. 2011 年《邮政服务法》(d) 第 27 (3) 条所定义的邮政运营商，在工作过程中曾前往英国。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 31. A worker with specialist technical skills, where those specialist technical skills are required for essential or emergency works or services (including commissioning, maintenance, and repairs and safety checks) to ensure the continued production, supply, movement, manufacture, storage or preservation of goods, where they have travelled to the United Kingdom in the course of their work or otherwise to commence or resume their work.
annotations.translation: 31. 具有专业技术技能的工人，这些专业技术技能是必要或紧急工作或服务（包括调试、维护、修理和安全检查）所必需的，以确保持续生产、供应、移动、制造、储存或保存货物，他们在工作过程中或以其他方式开始或恢复工作期间前往英国。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 32. A worker with specialist technical skills, where those specialist technical skills are required for essential or emergency works (including construction, commissioning, installation, maintenance, repairs and safety checks) or to fulfil contractual obligations or warranty specifications in, or in connection with, waste management facilities used for the management, sorting, treatment, recovery, or disposal of waste (including energy from waste), where they have travelled to the United Kingdom in the course of their work.
annotations.translation: 32. 具有专业技术技能的工人，需要这些专业技术技能才能完成基本或紧急工作（包括施工、调试、安装、维护、维修和安全检查），或者在用于管理、分类、处理、回收或处置废物（包括废物能源）的废物管理设施中履行合同义务或保修规范，他们在工作过程中曾前往英国。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (a) 1998 c. 17. Section 44 was amended by paragraph 11 of Schedule 1 to the Energy Act 2008 (c. 32).

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (b) Section 9H was substituted by section 74 (2) of the Energy Act 2016 (c. 20).
annotations.translation: (b) 2016年《能源法》第74 (2)节（ c.20 ）取代了第9H节。

annotations.label: Footnote
annotations.text: (c) Section 45A was inserted by section 75 (1) of the Energy Act 2008. There are amendments to section 45A (10) but none is relevant.
annotations.translation: (c) 第 45A 条由 2008 年能源法第 75(1)条插入。 第 45A (10) 条有一些修正案，但都不相关。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) the activities are required to ensure continued safe operation of the facility,
annotations.translation: (b) 为确保该设施持续安全运行而需要进行的活动，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) For the purposes of sub-paragraph (1) —
annotations.translation: (2) 就第(1)分段而言

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) a facility has a capacity in excess of 20,000 tonnes at any time if it was used in the previous calendar year for the purposes of downstream oil sector activities in relation to more than that number of tonnes of oil;
annotations.translation: (a) 如果某设施在上一个日历年中被用于下游石油部门的活动，且涉及的石油吨数超过 20,000 吨，则该设施在任何时候的容量都超过 20,000 吨；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) "specified activities" are
annotations.translation: (b) “特定活动” 是

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) storing oil,
annotations.translation: (i) 储存油品，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) handling oil,
annotations.translation: (ii) 处理石油、石油

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) the carriage of oil by sea or inland water,
annotations.translation: (iii) 海上或内陆水域运油，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iv) conveying oil by pipes,
annotations.translation: (iv) 通过管道输送石油，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (v) refining or otherwise processing oil.
annotations.translation: (v) 精炼或以其他方式加工石油。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) activities on or in relation to an offshore installation;
annotations.translation: (a) 海上设施上或与之相关的活动；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) activities on or in relation to upstream petroleum infrastructure;
annotations.translation: (b) 上游石油基础设施上的活动或与上游石油基础设施有关的活动；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) critical safety work on an offshore installation or well being decommissioned or preserved pending demolition or reuse; or
annotations.translation: (c) 正在退役或保存以待拆除或再利用的海上设施或油井的关键安全工 作；或

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (d) activities for the provision of workers , goods, materials or equipment or other essential services required to support the safe operation of the activities referred to in paragraphs (a) to (c) ,
annotations.translation: (d) 提供工人、货物、材料或设备或其他必要服务以支持(a)至(c)段所述活动安全运行的活动，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) For the purposes of sub-paragraph (1) —
annotations.translation: (2) 就第 (1) 分段而言—

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) "offshore installation" has the meaning given in section 44 of the Petroleum Act 1998 (a);
annotations.translation: (a) “海上设施”具有1998年《石油法》 (a)第44节中规定的含义;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) "upstream petroleum infrastructure" has the meaning given in section 9H of the Petroleum Act 1998 (b);
annotations.translation: (b) “上游石油基础设施” 的含义见1998年《石油法》 (b)第9H条；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) "well" has the meaning given in section 45A (10) of the Petroleum Act 1998 (c).
annotations.translation: (c)  “井”具有1998年《石油法》 (c)第45A (10)节中给出的含义。
